# Howard Smith (bobsleigh)

| birth_place    =
| death_date     =
| death_place    =
}}
Howard Smith (born 29 September 1956) is a British bobsledder [https://www.southwalesargus.co.uk/news/25301431.blackwood-b-b-owner-wanted-sexually-abuse-young-girl/].  He competed in the four man event at the 1984 Winter Olympics.
